Items.Title: Roll Call
Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
INVOCATION - Delivered by: Rabbi Barry Dov Katz, Conservative Synagogue Adath Israel of Riverdale located at 475 West 250th Street, Bronx NY 10471.

Motion to spread the Invocation in full upon the record by Council Member Dinowitz.
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by Rabbi  Barry Dov Katz, Conservative Synagogue Adath Israel of Riverdale located at 475 West 250th Street,THe Bronx, N.Y. 10471.

Council Member Dinowitz moved to spread the Invocation in full upon the Record.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the Mayor of New York City, when contracting for the purchase, operation, and maintenance of zero emission vehicles, to procure on the basis of best value.
Items.AgendaNote: Preconsidered - Adopted by the Committee on Environmental Protection, Resiliency and Waterfronts
Items.MinutesNote:
Pursuant to Rule 8.50 of the Council, the Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers) called for a voice vote.  Hearing no objections, the Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers) declared the Resolution to be adopted.

Adopted unanimously by the Council by voice-vote.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by voice vote.
Items.MatterName: Calling on the Mayor of New York City, when contracting for the purchase, operation, and maintenance of zero emission vehicles, to procure on the basis of best value.

Items.MinutesNote: The Majority Leader (Council Member Powers) presiding as the President Pro Tempore.

The presence of a quorum was announced by the Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers).

There were 47 Council Members marked present at this Stated Meeting (including CMs Barron Gennaro, Hanif, Moya, Salamanca, Sanchez, and Vernikov who participated remotely).
At this point the Speaker (Council Member Adams) made the following announcements:

Whereupon on motion of the Speaker (Council Member Adams), the Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers) adjourned these proceedings to meet again for the Stated Meeting of Thursday, October 5, 2023.

MICHAEL M. McSWEENEY, City Clerk
Clerk of the Council

Negative: CM Yeger.

Preconsidered Res. No. 787,  VOTE:41-6-0
